```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

This package allows use of UCSF color themes with ggplot2 and a basic RMarkdown template so that figures made with R match our UCSF document and presentation templates. All data are sourced from http://identity.ucsf.edu
